content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 12, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 53, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft cut_sandstone, I need to place sandstone blocks in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. The first one needs to go into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 12, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 53, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft cut_sandstone, I need to place sandstone blocks in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. The second one needs to go into slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 12, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 53, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft cut_sandstone, I need to place sandstone blocks in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. The third one needs to go into slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 12, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 53, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft cut_sandstone, I need to place sandstone blocks in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. The last one needs to go into slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 12, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 53, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I can craft the cut_sandstone by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
